title: Student Progress Monitoring Strategies through LMS-Based Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with Basic Online Learning Tools and Advanced Expertise in the Relevant Scientific Field
context.additional_context: Project-based science education course conducted in smartphone-centric constrained technological environments, primarily comprising professionals from medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Learners will analyze data collected from the Learning Management System (LMS) to identify individual student progress patterns with 80% accuracy.
Based on learning metric analysis, learners will design a process to identify underperforming students at two-week intervals.
Learners will express individual progress status with 90% readability through mobile-optimized visualizations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
